Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.zoe.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Agent
extends Thread
    This class defines an Agent, the core of the Zoe library.

    25th October, 2017

      • resolve

        private org.json.JSONObject resolve(org.zoe.Intent intent,
                                    org.json.JSONObject main)
                             throws org.zoe.NoResolverException
        This method resolves an intent and returns the resolution. The resolution is constructed by adding the data type of the resolver to the resolution. If an IntentErrorException has been thrown, it will return the error object plus the error message, and add that message to the main message.
        Parameters:
        intent - Intent to resolve
        main - Main message where the intent is
        Returns:
        Resolved intent
        Throws:
        org.zoe.NoResolverException

      • intentResolver

        public final org.json.JSONObject intentResolver(org.json.JSONObject json)
                                         throws org.zoe.NoResolverException,
                                                org.zoe.NotAnIntentException,
                                                org.zoe.ErrorMessageException
        This method will search for intents and resolve the appropriate one in the JSON json
        Parameters:
        json - The message to resolve
        Returns:
        Resolved message
        Throws:
        org.zoe.NotAnIntentException
        org.zoe.NoResolverException
        org.zoe.ErrorMessageException

      • intentResolver

        private org.json.JSONObject intentResolver(org.json.JSONObject json,
                                           org.json.JSONObject main)
                                    throws org.zoe.NoResolverException,
                                           org.zoe.NotAnIntentException,
                                           org.zoe.ErrorMessageException
        This method searches for an intent recursively, from left to right, in depth, until it reaches a valid one; and returns the main json with the intent resolved
        Parameters:
        json - The intent to resolve
        main - The main message where the intent is
        Returns:
        The main message resolved
        Throws:
        org.zoe.NotAnIntentException
        org.zoe.NoResolverException
        org.zoe.ErrorMessageException
        org.json.JSONException

      • addResolver

        public void addResolver(org.zoe.Resolver resolver)
        Adds a Resolver to the resolver list. Resolvers will be chosen by the API to resolve intents based on their name. This method is idempotent, i.e., already registered resolvers will not be added.
        Parameters:
        resolver - Resolver class that implements the intent solution

      • send

        public void send(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Publishes in the kafkamq queue the parameter given.
        Parameters:
        json - Message to be delivered
